import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update event types by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/types/ids/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple event types by explicit ID list. Each item should include the `EventTypeId` and the fields to change, allowing bulk renames or scope adjustments.

**Prerequisites**
1. **EventTypeIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/events/types/query](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-query-post) and extract `Items[].EventTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query types: [POST /api/v1.0/events/types/query](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-query-post) -&gt; extract `Items[].EventTypeId`.
2. Build `UpdateEventTypeRequest` items with `EventTypeId` and updated fields.
3. Submit update: [PUT /api/v1.0/events/types/ids/update](/docs/api/events/update-event-types-by-ids).

**Minimal Required Fields**: Each item must include `EventTypeId` plus at least one field to update.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request model for creating or updating an event type.","properties":{"EventTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Event type ID (required for updates)."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for site-specific event types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"],"description":"Visibility scope of the event type."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the event type."},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Icon identifier for the event type."}},"title":"UpdateEventTypeRequest"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Items updated.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response after updating multiple event types.","properties":{"ItemIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"EventTypeBatchUpdateResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
